title: Fix font color visibility on Hero section second CTA button

requirements.text: In the Hero component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx), fix the text color of the second CTA button identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/button[2] so that its label text is clearly visible. Apply a high-contrast text color (e.g., white or dark green) that is legible against the button's background. Ensure the button label remains readable in all states (default, hover, focus).

quotes: change the color of the font as they are not visible

acceptanceCriteria: The second CTA button in the Hero section displays its label text in a clearly visible, high-contrast color against its background.
The button text is legible on both desktop and mobile viewports.
The button text remains visible on hover and focus states.
No other Hero section buttons or elements are unintentionally affected.

constraints: Only change the text/font color of the second CTA button in the Hero section as identified by the provided XPath. Do not restructure or restyle other elements.
nonGoals: Changing button background colors beyond what is necessary for contrast.
Modifying any other section's font colors.
Altering button layout, size, or typography.
